includedAssets.title: Episode 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Heartbroken and disillusioned, junior doctor Ruby Walker ditches her life in the UK for a fresh start at the Good Karma Hospital.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Heartbroken and disillusioned, junior doctor Ruby Walker ditches her life in the UK for a fresh start at the Good Karma Hospital.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Heartbroken and disillusioned, junior doctor Ruby Walker ditches her life in the UK for a fresh start at the Good Karma Hospital.

includedAssets.title: Episode 2
includedAssets.synopsis: As the team race against the clock to treat a snake catcher, tensions mount when new girl Ruby questions Gabriel's conduct.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the team race against the clock to treat a snake catcher, tensions mount when new girl Ruby questions Gabriel's conduct.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the team race against the clock to treat a snake catcher, tensions mount when new girl Ruby questions Gabriel's conduct.

includedAssets.title: Episode 3
includedAssets.synopsis: As Holi festival fever hits the hospital, an abandoned baby strikes a chord with Ruby. Lydia is reacquainted with an ageing expat artist.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Holi festival fever hits the hospital, an abandoned baby strikes a chord with Ruby. Lydia is reacquainted with an ageing expat artist.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Holi festival fever hits the hospital, an abandoned baby strikes a chord with Ruby. Lydia is reacquainted with an ageing expat artist.

includedAssets.title: Episode 4
includedAssets.synopsis: On the day that he is attending a lavish Indian wedding, Ram clashes with Lydia. Meanwhile, Ruby is left questioning where she truly belongs.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: On the day that he is attending a lavish Indian wedding, Ram clashes with Lydia. Meanwhile, Ruby is left questioning where she truly belongs.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: On the day that he is attending a lavish Indian wedding, Ram clashes with Lydia. Meanwhile, Ruby is left questioning where she truly belongs.

includedAssets.title: Episode 5
includedAssets.synopsis: Lydia and Ruby visit a convent where Lydia's interference in the destiny of a young nun backfires - bringing Lydia and Ruby to blows.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lydia and Ruby visit a convent where Lydia's interference in the destiny of a young nun backfires - bringing Lydia and Ruby to blows.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lydia and Ruby visit a convent where Lydia's interference in the destiny of a young nun backfires - bringing Lydia and Ruby to blows.

includedAssets.title: Episode 6
includedAssets.synopsis: As the monsoon rains arrive, tensions run high between Lydia and Ruby. Meanwhile, Maggie's health worsens, but will she be granted her dying wish?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the monsoon rains arrive, tensions run high between Lydia and Ruby. Meanwhile, Maggie's health worsens, but will she be granted her dying wish?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the monsoon rains arrive, tensions run high between Lydia and Ruby. Meanwhile, Maggie's health worsens, but will she be granted her dying wish?

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Six part drama following junior doctor Ruby Walker (Amrita Acharia) as she joins the team of an understaffed and overworked hospital in rural India. Amanda Redman and Neil Morrissey also star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Six part drama following junior doctor Ruby Walker (Amrita Acharia) as she joins the team of an understaffed and overworked hospital in rural India.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Six part drama following junior doctor Ruby Walker (Amrita Acharia) as she joins the team of an understaffed and overworked hospital in rural India. Amanda Redman and Neil Morrissey also star.

includedIn.title: The Good Karma Hospital
includedIn.synopsis: Junior doctor Ruby Walker attempts to escape her life in the UK by joining the team of an understaffed and overworked hospital in rural India.
